Reason: The REUSE_SPACE configuration option in the h2 software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value can significantly impact system performance. When the REUSE_SPACE value is increased, it allows for more efficient use of memory by reusing previously allocated space, reducing memory consumption and potentially improving overall system performance. On the other hand, decreasing the REUSE_SPACE value may lead to increased memory fragmentation and higher memory consumption, resulting in degraded system performance.
